msbt.message: Seems like every time I see a rare bug, I end up scarin' it off.I know you're supposed to creep up on 'em nice and quiet, but that just ain't my style!Next time, though! I'm gonna roll up on that bug so fast it won't know what caught it, !
Yo You didn't see that just now, right? OK, good.Then nobody's ever gonna know that I got tangled up in my fishing line and started freakin' out Aw, c'mon!
I'm keepin' an eye out for thirsty- looking flowers, .I care a lot about my plants, y'know I don't get why folks are so surprised when they find out.

I'm using an umbrella, but I ain't happy about it. These things are such a pain, .But last time I left mine behind, I got so soaked that I was laid up with a fever for a week. It was real bad.So if that's the alternativeI'll take the umbrella.
